001package edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.viewmodel;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import android.util.Log;
005import androidx.lifecycle.DefaultLifecycleObserver;
006import androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner;
007import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
008import androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData;
009import androidx.lifecycle.Transformations;
010import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel;
011import dagger.hilt.android.lifecycle.HiltViewModel;
012import dagger.hilt.android.qualifiers.ApplicationContext;
013import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.R;
014import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model.Game;
015import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.service.CodebreakerRepository;
016import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.service.PreferencesRepository;
017import io.reactivex.rxjava3.disposables.CompositeDisposable;
018import java.util.stream.Collectors;
019import java.util.stream.Stream;
020import javax.inject.Inject;
021import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
022
023@HiltViewModel
024public class CodebreakerViewModel extends ViewModel implements DefaultLifecycleObserver {
025
026  private static final String TAG = CodebreakerViewModel.class.getSimpleName();
027  private final CodebreakerRepository codebreakerRepository;
028  private final PreferencesRepository preferencesRepository;
029  private final MutableLiveData<Game> game;
030  private final LiveData<Boolean> inProgress;
031  private final MutableLiveData<Throwable> throwable;
032  private final CompositeDisposable pending;
033  private final String pool;
034  private final String codeLengthKey;
035  private final int codeLengthDefault;
036
037
038  @Inject
039  CodebreakerViewModel(@ApplicationContext Context context,
040      CodebreakerRepository codebreakerRepository,
041      PreferencesRepository preferencesRepository) {
042    this.codebreakerRepository = codebreakerRepository;
043    this.preferencesRepository = preferencesRepository;
044    game = new MutableLiveData<>();
045    throwable = new MutableLiveData<>();
046    pending = new CompositeDisposable();
047    inProgress = Transformations.map(game, (game) -> game != null && !game.isSolved());
048    pool = Stream.of(context.getResources().getStringArray(R.array.color_names))
049        .map((name) -> name.substring(0, 1))
050        .collect(Collectors.joining());
051    codeLengthKey = context.getString(R.string.code_length_key);
052    codeLengthDefault = context.getResources().getInteger(R.integer.code_length_default);
053    startGame();// // FIXME: 2/13/2024 Should usually be driven by the UI
054  }
055
056  public void startGame() {
057    throwable.setValue(null);
058    int length = preferencesRepository.get(codeLengthKey, codeLengthDefault);
059    Game game = new Game(pool, length);
060    codebreakerRepository
061        .startGame(game)
062        .subscribe(
063            this.game::postValue,
064            this::postThrowable,
065            pending
066        );
067  }
068
069  public LiveData<Game> resumeGame(String id) {
070    throwable.setValue(null);
071    codebreakerRepository
072        .getGame(id)
073        .subscribe(
074            this.game::postValue,
075            this::postThrowable,
076            pending
077        );
078    return game;
079  }
080
081  public void submitGuess(String text) {
082    throwable.setValue(null);
083    codebreakerRepository
084        .submitGuess(text)
085        .subscribe(
086            (guess)->game.postValue(game.getValue()),
087            this::postThrowable,
088            pending
089        );
090  }
091
092  public LiveData<Game> getGame() {
093    return game;
094  }
095
096  public LiveData<Boolean> getInProgress() {
097    return inProgress;
098  }
099
100  public LiveData<Throwable> getThrowable() {
101    return throwable;
102  }
103
104  @Override
105  public void onStop(@NotNull LifecycleOwner owner) {
106    DefaultLifecycleObserver.super.onStop(owner);
107    pending.clear();
108  }
109
110  private void postThrowable(Throwable throwable) {
111    Log.e(TAG, throwable.getMessage(), throwable);
112    this.throwable.postValue(throwable);
113  }
114}
